    七転び八起き
    Nana korobi, ya oki
    Fall down seven times, stand up eight

    I am a first-year Ph.D. student at The University of Texas at Austin being advised by Professor Junyi Jessy Li.

    My research interests lie in evaluating and adapting large language models for expert and high-stakes domains.

    Education



    Ph.D. in Computer Science
    University of Texas at Austin | 2024 - Present

    M.S. and B.S. in Computer Science | Minor in Business
    University of Texas at Austin | 2019 - 2024
